Remote

Community Manager

APPLY

Zeppelin builds the industry security standard for architecting and deploying smart contract systems in public blockchains. We build open source infrastructure and conduct in-depth system security audits to high-impact smart contract systems. Learn more about us!


You are the type of person who loves to motivate and encourage others. You are passionate about technology, and love staying up-to-date on the latest developments. You are detail-oriented and love getting things done.

What you'll do

As the Community Manager, you will be the organizing brain and the welcoming heart of our global community. Specifically, you will:

  • Grow and energize the worldwide community of OpenZeppelin & ZeppelinOS advocates.

  • Help us moderate and understand our community terms of health, quantity and quality.

  • Help community members find their role in the community and build community ambassadors.

  • Provide meaningful reports of discussion, sentiment and feedback on our products.

  • Motivate leaders in the community to contribute code, content, evangelize and act as references.

Who you are

  • You have a strong technical background that allows you to engage in high level technical discussion.

  • You have prior community management experience.

  • You possess strong organizational and relationship-building skills.

  • You have excellent writing skills.

  • <p class="small left-aligned"You have an extroverted personality - you should get energy from interacting with others.></p>

Apply

Complete the following application form or send an email to jobs@zeppelin.solutions with the phrase "Community Manager: Remote" on the subject line.
